The Anti-panties was an item that was involved in the 2015 Halloween event, during which the player must evict the Anti-Santa for the Grim Reaper by using it to light the boiler in the basement. It was found near him, in front of the sofa.

After completing the event, the Grim Reaper will give players a shrunken pair of pants.

This item can be stored in the toy box of a costume room.

[[File:Anti-panties detail.png|left|120px]]
The '''Anti-panties''' was an item that was involved in the [[2015 Halloween event]], during which the player must evict the [[Anti-Santa]] for the [[Grim Reaper]] by using it to light the boiler in the basement. It was found near him, in front of the sofa.

After completing the event, the [[Grim Reaper]] will give players a shrunken pair of pants.
